column4: the burn:// thing upset me one time because it doesn't append files o an existing cd :(
It isn't multisession by default? (or at all??)
i dont think so, i had two files on a CDRW thn the next day i dragged a file in burn:// and clicked the 'burn' buton and all that was on my cd was .... that one last file :(
Hmm.. ok. I've never used that, so I wouldn't know. :)
